name: percussively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves percussion instruments (= musical instruments that you play by hitting them) or making a regular pattern of sounds by hitting something: The musicians tapped percussively on their guitars. He always had the bow in his hand, and the bow would strike the cello percussively.
More examplesFewer examplesThe dancers' feet are used percussively, emphasized by bells on their ankles.Performers used the insides of the container percussively to produce driving rhythms.She often used a percussively repeated single note.
